data.title: Allinial Fund application
data.meta_description: Partners need to meet some requirements to receive the Allinial Global co-marketing fund. This includes following brand guidelines and submitting certain documents.
data.text:
Learn about the Allinial Global co-marketing fund and its benefits

The Allinial Global co-marketing fund is available to all Allinial Global member firms. Find out about how to apply.

Weâll cover up to 50% of your approved marketing activity (including local taxes) up to the limit of $2,000 USD until 31 March 2024. Funding can go towards more than one marketing activity, but canât total more than $2,000 USD.

*Please address invoices to: Xero Inc., 1615 Platte Street Denver, CO 80202. Payment terms are Net30. US partners pay in USD.

There are a number of other activities that qualify for funding. At a minimum, all marketing activity must include the Xero global partner logo.

The Xero global partner badge has been designed for use on promotional materials. To see how to use the Xero global partner badge correctly, please refer to the Xero global partner guidelines. Please follow the guidelines when choosing sizes, clear space, logo colors, badges, and ribbons.

If you canât find the support you need here, please contact your Xero account manager.

All advertisements must comply with applicable laws.It is the partnerâs responsibility to ensure all activities comply with these laws. Advertisements must not breach another personâs copyright or other intellectual property rights.

Any marketing activity that promotes Xero or is funded in part or whole by Xero, must be Xero-specific and cannot mention other accounting software products. Xeroâs branding must appear in all activities and needs to follow Xeroâs brand guidelines.
